resources.string:
Alexis Murauskas - CS410J - Winter2020 - Project6
 Airline Android Application

 Usage: add and view collections of airlines and associated flights

 A new airline contains the following information:

 Name - the name of the airline
 Flight Number - the flight identifier
 Source - three-letter code of departure airport
 Departs - departure date (m/d/yyyy) and time (h:mm am/pm)
 Destination - three-letter code of arrival airport
 Arrives - arrival date (m/d/yyyy) and time (h:mm am/pm)
